players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob was killed. Alice, if you're the detective, who did you investigate? If you didn't investigate, I suspect Charlie might be mafia."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night, and he's the mafioso."
Charlie: "I was investigating Bob last night; he was killed, so I can't confirm. I think Diana is suspicious."
You: "Charlie is mafia. I'm the detective. Vote him out, Diana. Bob was killed. Charlie's claim is false."
Charlie: "Alice, you claimed to investigate me, but I was investigating Bob. The only way is that you lied. Vote Alice. I'm innocent."
Diana: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested
